title: His Wounded Light
description: The perfect life. The perfect marriage. The jilted lover. Their worlds collide.Fate intervenes twelve years later and their paths intersect once again. All three will question whether the heart is truly capable of dividing and being divided; each will decide whether it matters who you loved first or who you love last. Together they will learn that in the end, there can always only be one.
author: Christine Brae
